summary: REQ-2 appears implemented via a pre-React loading placeholder added to frontend/index.html. REQ-1 (actual redeploy + new Internet Computer URL) is not evidenced by the provided diff summary. An additional React AppErrorBoundary component was added, which was not explicitly requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Redeploy the current application build to the Internet Computer and provide a fresh, user-accessible deployment URL that loads the app successfully in a browser.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows frontend code/content changes (e.g., index.html, new React component) and a project_state update; there is no evidence of deployment execution, canister/network configuration updates, CI/CD changes, or a produced/shared deployment URL.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a React-level application error boundary UI with reload/try-again actions.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 asks for a pre-hydration/loading placeholder when the React bundle is slow or fails to load; it does not request an in-app React error boundary component/UI.
